text: Samuel Harris Altman ( ; born April 22, 1985) is an American businessman and investor. He has been chief executive officer of OpenAI since 2019 (even though he was briefly fired in 2023) and president of Y Combinator from 2011 to 2019. Altman was named one of the 100 most influential people in the world by Time magazine in 2023. ==References== Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Businesspeople from Chicago Category:OpenAI
title: Sam Altman
